summary: A model class that integrates a NeMo GPT language model with a multimodal base model, delivering standard GPT functionality within a multimodal framework and providing utilities for forward execution and optional freezing of the language component.
business_intent: Facilitate the deployment and fine‑tuning of GPT‑based language capabilities as part of a multimodal system, allowing developers to leverage pretrained language models while controlling training of the LLM component.
